wikipedia_page.main: Michael Gordon Roberts (born  (1946-02-20) 20 February 1946) is a former Wales international rugby union player. He attended Ruthin School. In 1971 he toured New Zealand with the British & Irish Lions and at the time played club rugby for London Welsh RFC.
